content: So, what did I learn? You can’t break a promise and then get mad when someone breaks a promise to you. Karma. We always want it to work when it is against someone else. I don’t think anyone ever says, “Karma, bring it on!” when talking about themselves. Unless you happen to be on Santa’s nice list. And if you are, can you PLEASE ask for a snowboard for me? I mean well. Most of the time : )
